config/nameserver net_address 10.1.1.197 10.2.2.198 192.3.3.132
config/options astring retrans:3\ retry:1\ timeout:3\ ndots:2
config/search astring us.oracle.com oracle.com
config/sortlist astring 10.1.2.3 10.2.3.4
config/value_authorization astring solaris.smf.value.name-service.dns.client
config/domain astring oracle.com
